description: This file implements the server-side entry point for a Remix web application, handling incoming HTTP requests, differentiating between bot and browser requests, and streaming server responses with error handling and CORS support.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that sets CORS headers, differentiates between OPTIONS, bot, and browser requests, and delegates to appropriate handler functions.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server requests identified as from bots, rendering the React app to a pipeable stream and generating the HTTP response accordingly.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles requests from browsers, similarly rendering the React app with streaming and error handling.
